description:
This course is designed to get you started with ASP .Net platform quickly. Once you have gone through the course, you will understand the difference between ASP .NET and PHP. I have taken the example based approach to show the details of the topics.

This is how the course is structured:

First you will learn file structure of asp .net project

Then, you will develop an application which connects MYSQL with ASP .NET

I highly recommend all the student who are getting started with web development to enroll in this course. This course will give you the summary of ASP .NET in less than 3 hours.
title: Introduction to ASP .Net
